title: A Grandma's Warm Hearth and Homemade Loaves
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), detailed illustration, Modern Anime style, 16:9 aspect ratio. A warm, cozy kitchen scene. A sweet, smiling elderly woman (grandmother/obasan) with neatly tied gray hair is kneading fresh bread dough on a wooden countertop. She wears a floral apron and a warm knit sweater. To her right, a traditional stone brick oven holds a loaf baking in the flame. A fluffy white cat with expressive golden eyes sits on a wooden stool nearby. Detailed background showing a large open window overlooking a lush, sunlit cottage garden with pink blossoms. Freshly baked loaves cooling on a rack. Warm volumetric lighting, detailed wooden textures, rustic charm, domestic bliss.
